00050 CompositeOFScalarAdd::CompositeOFScalarAdd( double alp, 
00051                                             ObjectiveFunction* Obj1,
00052                                             bool delete_OF)
00053   : deleteObjFunc(delete_OF)
00054 {
00055   objFunc=Obj1;
00056   mAlpha=alp;
00057 }

00063     delete objFunc;

00066 ObjectiveFunction* CompositeOFScalarAdd::clone() const

00083 bool CompositeOFScalarAdd::initialize_block_coordinate_descent( 
00084                                                        Mesh* mesh, 
00085                                                        MeshDomain* domain,
00086                                                        const Settings* settings,
00087                                                        PatchSet* user_set,
00088                                                        MsqError& err )
00089 {
00090   bool rval = objFunc->initialize_block_coordinate_descent( mesh, domain, settings, user_set, err );
00091   return !MSQ_CHKERR(err) && rval;

00094 bool CompositeOFScalarAdd::evaluate( EvalType type, 
00095                                      PatchData& pd,
00096                                      double& value_out,
00097                                      bool free,
00098                                      MsqError& err )
00099 {
00100   bool ok = objFunc->evaluate( type, pd, value_out, free, err );
00101   value_out += mAlpha;
00102   return !MSQ_CHKERR(err) && ok;
00103 }
